pr_title: NF: undo message is more specific

timeline.author: david-allison-1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -78,7 +78,9 @@
     <string name="undo_action_bury_card">bury card</string>
     <string name="undo_action_bury_note">bury note</string>
     <string name="undo_action_suspend_card">suspend card</string>
+    <string name="undo_action_unsuspend_card">suspend card</string>
     <string name="undo_action_suspend_note">suspend note</string>
+    <string name="undo_action_unsuspend_note">suspend note</string>

replies.bodyText: Deleted. I reuse strings and thought I already deleted the strings I temporarily added
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

timeline.bodyText: Could you document what hasUnmarked means?
timeline.author: david-allison-1

timeline.bodyText: ditto - quick comment on meaning of hasUnsuspended
timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText:
Done
I kept the same name for the argument and for the parameter
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

timeline.message:
NF: undo message is more specific

It allows to know whether we will undo a suspend or an unsuspend. And similarly for marking
